name: Forest Quest (TOJam 2021)
description:
Our project for TOJam 2021, the start of a Metroidvania game in a forest. With an angry goat on a pole.

Gamepad controls:
A: Jump
B: Melee
X: Run
Y: Throw
Use left stick or DPad to move.

Keyboard controls:
WASD to move.
R: Run
Space: Jump
Enter: Melee
RCtrl: Throw
